game.name: 宝贝别怕有我在 Not fear I'm here.
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: “Not fear I'm here” is a live-action interactive romantic suspense. Once a "campus legend" (low-key after early financial freedom), you’re trapped by a plotted class reunion. Choose with your school first love—meet 5 women. Little dating experience? Choice is yours!
game.shortDescriptionEn: “Not fear I'm here” is a live-action interactive romantic suspense. Once a "campus legend" (low-key after early financial freedom), you’re trapped by a plotted class reunion. Choose with your school first love—meet 5 women. Little dating experience? Choice is yours!
